Content: Market networks will create traderoutes between the stations, the
length of this routes and the cargo ships (more specifi the cargo *
speed value of them) determine the througput. This routes can be raided
yielding ressources in a semi random distribution out of the markets
inventory. Semi random the relativ amount of looted goods corresponds
to the goods availabel on the market with a little random fluctuation.
Alternativley only one kind of good is looted per transport and the
kind of good is randomly drawn according to the ratios of the market.
Plundered goods are removed before the buyers get their stuff.
